content: क्रोडः [क्रुड् घनीभावे संज्ञायां घञ्] {@--1@} A hog. {@--2@} The hollow of a tree, cavity; हा हा हंत तथापि जन्मविटपिक्रोडे मनो धावति <ls>Udb.</ls> {@--3@} The chest, bosom, breast; क्रोडीकृ to clasp to the bosom; क्रोडीकरोति प्रथमं यथा जातमनित्यता . धात्रीव जननी पश्चात्तथा शोकस्य कः क्रमः .. <ls>Nāg. 4</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 35.</ls> {@--4@} The middle part of anything; <ls>Vikr. 11. 75</ls>; see क्रोड {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--5@} An epithet of the planet Saturn. --डं, --डा {@--1@} The breast, chest, the part between the shoulders. {@--2@} The interior of anything, a cavity, hollow. {@--3@} The breast of a horse. {@--4@} The lap; <ls>U. 4.</ls>
